fields.name: name
fields.label: Section Name
fields.description: The label shown for this section in the Content Tree

fields.name: anchor-section-url
fields.label: Anchor Section URL
fields.description: This will appear in your URL following a #

fields.name: show-back-to-link
fields.label: Show back to top link
fields.description: If checked, 'back to top' link will be visible at the end of the anchor section

fields.name: exclude-from-anchor-link
fields.label: Exclude from Anchor Link
fields.description: Excludes anchor heading from anchor link component

fields.name: jcr:title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Defines the the page meta title for SEO, as well as a title displayable in the page content (unless and overriding 'Page Title' below is defined).

fields.name: pageTitle
fields.label: Page Title
fields.description: Defines a page title that is displayable in the page content, instead of the 'Title'
The accordion item heading HTML element.
fields.name: headingType
fields.label: Heading Type

fields.name: isExpandFirstAccordion
fields.label: Expand First Accordion
fields.description: When enabled the first accordion is expanded by default.

fields.label: FAQ
fields.name: faq
fields.description: Enable this toggle if the accordion block is intended to be used as an FAQ.
This will appear in your URL following a #. Use lowercase English letters and hyphens as word separators.
fields.name: id
fields.label: ID

validation.customErrorMsg: Use lowercase English letters and hyphens as word separators.

fields.name: link1_image
fields.label: Image 1
fields.description: Recommended asset type SVG.

fields.name: link1_imageAlt
fields.label: Alternative Text for Accessibility 1
fields.description: Write descriptive, concise, relevant alt text to describe the image in context, enhancing accessibility for visually impaired users and improving SEO.

fields.name: link2_image
fields.label: Image 2
fields.description: Recommended asset type SVG.

fields.name: link2_imageAlt
fields.label: Alternative Text for Accessibility 2
fields.description: Write descriptive, concise, relevant alt text to describe the image in context, enhancing accessibility for visually impaired users and improving SEO.

fields.name: styles
fields.label: Style Options
fields.description: Please hit the x to make both CTA's secondary

fields.name: link1AriaLabel
fields.label: Aria Label
fields.description: Please refer to authoring guidelines before usage

fields.name: link1CampaignCode
fields.label: Campaign Code
fields.description: Use only for marketing campaign tracking – letters, numbers and dashes permitted. Don’t use to track general or BAU content links

validation.customErrorMsg: Only (a-z), (A-Z), (0-9), and (-) is allowed in this field

fields.label: Don't provide an alternative text
fields.description: Leave alt text empty for images that add no meaning or value. Marking them as decorative ensures assistive technologies ignore them.
